description:
This month's songwriting topic: HOLIDAYS

From the venue that brought you two of Rochester’s most exciting live competitions – The Choice (formerly Lovin’ Cup Idol) and Laughin’ Cup  – comes a brand new series that focuses on another topic integral to the performing arts: songwriting.

Lovin’ Cup is looking for Rochester’s best songwriters to take part in “The Write-Off”, where local original artists will duke it out for the title of “Songwriter of the Month”.

Competitors will perform their original songs live before a panel of esteemed contemporaries who, along with the audience, will determine the outcome of the night.

The catch?

The songwriters don’t find out their subject matter until the month leading up to the show, and have only from then until show time to write it.

Along with cash and prizes, each contest’s winner will receive something much more valuable… bragging rights for having written the best song of the month! ☺


FIRST WEDNESDAY OF EVERY MONTH!!

Lineup for 12/6:

Alex Northrup

Corey Comer

Ryan Kinal

Shea Rapp

Ronnie Watts



FOR PARTICIPANTS:

Are you interested in a little friendly competition with your fellow Rochesterian songwriters?

Submit your name, phone number, and a recorded sample of your songwriting (artist websites, YouTube, etc. are fine) to: thewriteoffrochester@gmail.com

Interested in being a judge on the panel? Let us know!
name: The Write-Off: songwriting competition at Lovin' Cup
